attributes.action: make mp's declare all expences and be accountable for what they spend OUR money on
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for too long MP's have been taking our hard earned money to use to their own benifit.  For instance furnising second homes when many cant afford a home as they cant get on the property ladder. there is too much done behind closed doors without the public being able to find out where our money is going and it needs to stop!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
